about_the_game:
The Coma 2: Vicious Sisters DLC is a new DLC level for Dark Deception: Monsters & Mortals. In this content you can explore and try to survive in Dokkaebi Market from the original The Coma 2: Vicious Sisters game.

The Coma 2: Vicious Sisters DLC includes:

- Dokkaebi Market map with the Butcher as the “Boss Time” NPC.

- Mina Park and Yaesol as a playable mortal characters.

- Dark Song as a playable monster character.
detailed_description:
The Coma 2: Vicious Sisters DLC is a new DLC level for Dark Deception: Monsters & Mortals. In this content you can explore and try to survive in Dokkaebi Market from the original The Coma 2: Vicious Sisters game.

The Coma 2: Vicious Sisters DLC includes:

- Dokkaebi Market map with the Butcher as the “Boss Time” NPC.

- Mina Park and Yaesol as a playable mortal characters.

- Dark Song as a playable monster character.

name: Monsters & Mortals - The Coma 2: Vicious Sisters

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4330/AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 3GB/ AMD Radeon R7 370 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 60fps low settings at 1080p
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7, Windows 8.1, or Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-750, 2.67 GHzj / AMD Phenom II X4 945, 3.0GHz or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 2070 8GB/ AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 60fps high settings at 1080p

short_description: The Coma 2: Vicious Sisters DLC is a new DLC level for Dark Deception: Monsters & Mortals.
